alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 3:16PM EST until January 02 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Saturday to 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain and snow will develop Saturday afternoon, transitioning to all snow late in the afternoon. A brief period of sleet will also be possible during the transition. The heaviest snowfall will likely occur Saturday night, mainly along and northwest of a Knox to Elkhart to Hillsdale line with amounts quickly tapering off southeast of this line.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
